title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface
name: EntityInterface
description:
Defines an interface for Datastore Entities.

This interface is fulfilled by Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityTrait, and it is recommended that classes implementing EntityInterface make use of that trait to ensure proper configuration.

methods.name: build
methods.description:
Create an instance of the entity class.

This factory method allows the implementor to define the means by which the key, entity data and entity options are managed within the entity implementation. This method is called by the Google Cloud PHP client to create entities.

params.name: key
params.description: The Entity's Key, defining its unique identifier. Defaults to null.

params.name: options.cursor
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface::cursor().

params.name: options.baseVersion
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface::baseVersion().

params.name: options.excludeFromIndexes
params.description: A list of entity keys to exclude from datastore indexes.

params.name: options.meanings
params.description: A list of meaning values for entity properties.

params.name: options.populatedByService
params.description: Indicates whether the entity was created as the result of a service request.

methods.name: mappings
methods.description:
Defines embedded entity mappings.

Embedded entities are converted to instances of Google\Cloud\Datastore\Entity, or to associative arrays by default. By providing mappings, you can define the types to use in your application.

Types must implement Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface.

returns.description: An associative array, where the key is the property name, and the value is the fully-qualified name of a PHP class implementing Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Return all entity data as an array.

methods.name: key
methods.description: Return the Datastore key, or null if no key is present.

methods.name: cursor
methods.description:
Fetch the cursor

This is only set when the entity was obtained from a query result. It can be used to manually paginate results.

methods.name: baseVersion
methods.description:
Fetch the baseVersion

This is only set when the entity was obtained from a query result. It is used for concurrency control internally.

methods.name: populatedByService
methods.description: Indicate whether the entity was created as the result of an API call.

methods.name: setExcludeFromIndexes
methods.description: A list of entity properties to exclude from datastore indexes.

params.name: properties
params.description: A list of properties to exclude from indexes.

methods.name: excludedProperties
methods.description: Return a list of properties excluded from datastore indexes.
